Thanks

item.title: Voting points
item.dc:creator: @lol_space1 lol space
item.description:
@lol_space1 wrote:

That would also change prices in PKP Shop/What ever points shop you have under

public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) {
If you want custom prices for different shops… Do something like

public int donatorshop(int id) {

public int speacialVote(int id) {
case ####:
return ####;

^ Thats for a vote point shop… If you want donor points shop change “specialVote” to "special

Now so that it’s not completely spoon feeding. Your going to need to figure out how to make the certain shop take the certain point value under “public int speacialVote(int id) {”

Have fun:)

Read full topic

item.title: Voting points
item.dc:creator: @Venge_Drop Venge Drop
item.description:
@Venge_Drop wrote:

First you need to let us know what base/revision you are using.
If your using a 317 PI then go to ShopAssistant.java.
If you already have your shop setup with the cases then it will be like this.

case 11726: case 11724: return 200;
Your item is

case 11726: case: 11724

Let me know if you cant figure it out ill help you somewhat. But id like for you to learn how to do it so you wont need help in the future.
Your Price is

so therefore those 2 items cost 200 points each.

Read full topic
